-Az idegeidet,
-A monitort beverő izomzataidat,

-A szexuális életedet mert az ideg is garantáltan megfog baszni,
-Az anyukád nemzőszervének kapacitását,
-A szomszédaiddal ápolt kapcsolatodat,
-A pénztárcád súlyát,
-A Pulzus számaidat

ugh I can't believe I've played 1000 hours

Since this game has become free the number of cheaters have increased very sharply, and this becomes ridiculous, we can no longer improve and enjoy the game as much. A more toxic population eand stupid comes on this game. I have been counter counter strike since these beginnings, I am sad that today the game has become also void because of its new community, mainly young people who have neither the age to play it nor the maturity to play collectively. 

I have the impression that valve no longer has this mentality of innovating, but thinks that money has been there for 5 years. I regret all my hours spent on it when I see what has become of it. we can always try to report, it does not change, we find these same members cheating months later without problems. this game is polluted
